SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AppView
The AppView class is responsible for displaying the main menu of the FYPMS application and handling user input.
ExcelData
The ExcelData class reads data from input Excel files.
FYP
The FYP class is a subclass of Supervisor and provides a way to create supervisor objects with a specialized name and ID
FYPController
The FYPController class represents the controller responsible for handling FYP supervisor related operations
FYPView
The FYPView class is responsible for displaying the options available for FYPs and handling user input related to FYPs.
Helper
A scanner object for reading user input from the console.
MainApp
This is the main class of the SC2002 Project
It is responsible for initializing the Database and the AppView.
Project
The Project class represents a project in the system.
ProjectController
The ProjectController class manages the functionality related to projects.
Functionality includes viewing, creating, assigning and deregistering projects
ProjectStatus
An enum class representing the status of a project.
Request
The Request class represents a request made for a project.
RequestController
The RequestController class handles requests made by students and supervisors regarding FYP projects.
RequestStatus
An enum class representing the status of a request.
RequestType
The RequestType enum represents the types of requests that can be made by students and supervisors regarding FYP projects.
Student
The Student class represents a student user in the system
It extends the User class and inherits its properties and methods.
StudentController
The StudentController class implements the UserController interface and provides methods to log in a student, authenticate password, change password, and select a project.
StudentView
The StudentView class represents the view for a student user.
StuToFYPReq
The StuToFYPReq class represents a request made by a student regarding a FYP project.
StuToSupReq
The StuToSupReq class extends the Request class and represents a request from a student to their supervisor.
Supervisor
A class representing a supervisor user in the FYP management system.
SupervisorController
A class representing a Supervisor Controller that implements the UserController interface.
SupervisorView
This class implements the View interface and represents the user interface for the Supervisor role.
SupToFYPReq
This class represents a supervisor to FYP request.
User
This class represents a user of the system.
UserController
The UserController interface provides methods to authenticate and log in a user.
View
The View interface provides methods to print the display and view the application.
